text: Bano Megolhusau Haralu is a journalist and a conservationist. She worked with Doordarshan, NDTV and was the editor of Eastern Mirror. She was awarded the Chameli Devi Jain Award for Outstanding Women Mediapersons and Nari Shakti Puraskar. She is a Director of the Nagaland Wildlife and Biodiversity Conservation Trust. ==References== Category:Indian women journalists Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Nari Shakti Puraskar winners Category:Living people
title: Bano Haralu
